### EXISTING STRUCTURES END

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt

### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure boiler has fuel before attempting to use it

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure steam engine is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it

### Errors when using offshore pump
- No errors found

### Errors when placing entities
- No errors found

### NAMESPACE

No important variables assigned by the agent.
